infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Allow NattyCheck to take photos for physique analysis.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Allow NattyCheck to access your photo library to upload physique images.

plugins.cameraPermission: Allow NattyCheck to access your camera for physique analysis.

plugins.photosPermission: Allow NattyCheck to access your photo library to upload physique images.
